title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.6 - Appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.6 - Appeal

State Regulations

In the event that a particular record cannot be made
available to the applicant, he is given a statutory right to appeal to the
chairman of the commission or to an authorized representative. [FN[DAGGER]]
Should the chairman or representative sustain the denial of the records
requested by the applicant, the applicant will be notified, in writing, within
seven business days of receipt of the appeal, the reasons therefor. The
chairman of the commission is Hon. Otto Kinzel, who may be contacted at the
offices of the commission. [FN[DAGGER]] Public Officers Law, ยง88(8)

Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
